notesStmt.note: Missing leaves after folio 83 and 160. Stained. Flaking ink.
Originally folio 213v contained a note of sale but is currently obliterated.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The Latter Prophets, accentuated and punctuated.

collation.p: Quires of 8 leaves each, originally signed with Hebrew letters at the end and at the beginning, currently trimmed.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi square script of the 12th or 13th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Latter Prophets. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional Ms. 4708.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Salomon da Costa, presented by him to the British Museum, 1759.
